text:
maqmuShmi#n ~MlOqka upa#tiShThEtE viqrAjyaqgniScE#taqvya# ityA#huqH srugvai viqrADyath srucA#vupaqdadhA#ti viqrAjyEqvAgniM ci#nutE yaj~jamuqKEya#j~jamuKEq vai kriqyamA#NE yaqj~ja(gm) rakShA(gm)#si jiGA(gm)santi yaj~jamuqKa(gm) ruqkmO yad-ruqkmaM ~MvyA#GAqraya#ti yaj~jamuqKAdEqva rakShAq(gg)qsyapa# hanti paq~jcaBiqvyA GA#rayatiq 
pA~gktO# yaqj~jO yAvA#nEqva yaqj~jastasmAqd-rakShAq(gg)qsyapa# hantyakShNaqyAvyA GA#rayatiq tasmA#dakShNaqyA ( ) paqSavO&~ggA#niq pra ha#rantiq prati#ShThityai || 40 
 (vanaqspata#yO- dakShiNaqtO- dha#tta- EnaqM- tasmA# dakShNaqyA-pa~jca# ca) (A7)
